bibl.title: The Nile Boatman at Work. (Münchner Ägyptologische Studien. 48.)
bibl.note: Diss. The Johns Hopkins Univ., 1995. The functions, titles, social station and status of Nile River boatmen, captains and sailors, from the Ramesside to the Graeco-Roman periods. - Pp. 168-173: Appendix One: P. Cairo Zenon IV, 59649 (interpretation of the text).
VINSON Steve, The Nile Boatman at Work. (Münchner Ägyptologische Studien. 48.)
Mainz am Rhein, Ph. von Zabern, 1998, 4°, xi-210 pp., 1 fac-sim., 6 tabl. ISBN 3-8053-2454-5.
